name: Die in the Dungeon (StarFahx)
description:
Roll through the dungeon. Find the exit. Try not to die.

Inspired by 90s-era dungeon-delvers, Die in the Dungeon is a game made for the GMTK Jam 2022 by Adam :), Dean Wesrey, StarFahx, and Toby West. With thanks to our friends for the frantic bug-hunting!

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Q or E to rotate controls
R to reset level
Click to interact
Esc to quit
